attributes.action: Ban the sale and personal use of fireworks
attributes.additional_details:
There has been many social media posts regarding the death of livestock and domestic animals that has died due to the stress caused by fireworks and in some cases have died as of the result of cruelty ( fireworks attached to their tails) 
Firework displays should only be allowe to happen on one weekend a bit over a 2-3 week period which typically happens in the present age.
attributes.background:
Each year around November 5th but not exclusively hundreds of animals lives for destroyed due the excessive use of fireworks 

Public displays of fireworks should only be allowed as they are for one safely conducted and on 1 night and not over a 2 week period which happens with personal displays
